story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: We sure are lucky, aren’t we, Zoroark?
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: We have so many friends cheering us on.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: Everyone is so precious to me...
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
How could I pick just one friend over everyone
else?
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
(“Nothing more than a freak without a human
heart...”)
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
(Am I actually a freak who can’t understand
feelings, just pretending to be human?)
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
(Is that why I can’t choose a number one?
Because my love isn’t true?)
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
After all of that, do you think you’re still worthy
of sharing the name Harmonia with me?
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You’re nothing but a warped, defective boy who
knows nothing...
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
It’s a waste of valuable time listening to him
ramble on.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: He is the one without a human heart!
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1600_10: N... You’ve just become more human, is all.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Suffering, worrying, and feeling lost are all part
of being human... Overcoming those struggles is
how we grow.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
You’ve suffered, worried, and felt lost.
But what you’ve obtained...
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: is a kind heart—and love for your Pokémon.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: I’m perfectly human—and I love my Pokémon!
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_2300_10: So they were your illusions after all, Zoroark.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_2400_10:
There are kinder ways of cheering me up,
you know.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_2500_10: *chuckle* I’m just kidding. I appreciate it.
story_arceus_03_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
My doubts and worries are gone now, thanks to
your tough love!
